prop.caption: position
prop.description: the position within the total length (same value as undolength). Use this attribute to bind a slider's value attribute to.

prop.caption: afterchange
prop.description: Fires after a change to the action stack occurs

prop.caption: beforechange
prop.description: Fires before a change to the action stack will occur

prop.caption: actionfail
prop.description: Fires when an action fails to be sent to the server.

prop.caption: actionsuccess
prop.description: Fires when an action is successfully sent to the server.
